DeconvoBuddies 0.99.0
  • Reference

Pseudobulks sce data over donor x cell type

Source: R/pseudobulk.R
pseudobulk.Rd

Pseudobulks sce data over donor x cell type

pseudobulk(sce, cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType"), add_symbol = FALSE)

Arguments

sce

Single cell experiment object
cell_group_cols

list of column names that create pseudobulk groups
add_symbol

Use Symbol from rowData as rownames

Value

Examples

pb_ab <- pseudobulk(sce_ab)
head(pb_ab)

#>           D1_A    D1_B    D2_A    D2_B
#> G-D1_A 4.70044 0.00000 0.00000 0.00000
#> G-D1_B 0.00000 4.70044 0.00000 0.00000
#> G-D2_A 0.00000 0.00000 4.70044 0.00000
#> G-D2_B 0.00000 0.00000 0.00000 4.70044

pb_ab_region <- pseudobulk(sce_ab, cell_group_cols = c("cellType", "donor", "region"))

#> Error in pseudobulk(sce_ab, cell_group_cols = c("cellType", "donor", "region")): unused argument (cell_group_cols = c("cellType", "donor", "region"))
head(pb_ab_region)

#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'head': object 'pb_ab_region' not found

pb_test <- pseudobulk(sce.test, cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType.Broad"))

#> Error in pseudobulk(sce.test, cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType.Broad")): unused argument (cell_group_cols = c("donor", "cellType.Broad"))
head(pb_test)

#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'head': object 'pb_test' not found
